column1: %calcTime=var from = fromtime != null ? fromtime.getTime() % 24*3600 : 0; var to = totime != null ? totime.getTime() % 24*3600 : 0; var p = pause != null ? (pause.getTime() - new Date(pause.toGMTString()).getTimezoneOffset()*60000) % dayTimeFraction : 0; Math.round(((to - from) - p) / (3600 * 10)) / 100;
